channel.title: (PI) Eclipse error
channel.description:
Hello there, I am not sure If I am supposed to post this here, but, I just tried setting up my server on Eclipse and i'm getting an error. So, I went ahead and followed this tutorial step by step here; https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527293.0 Then, now I am getting an error; My error; [CODE] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problem: Syntax error, annotations are only available if source level is 1.5 or greater
at server.util.ControlPanel.<init>(ControlPanel.java:40) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:68) [/CODE] That's what i'm facing at the moment. I think, I might've declared the "main class" wrong during the setup, but, I thought it was "server - server" Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks!

item.title: (PI) Eclipse error
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:550217”]Tbh, sounds packet related.

Are there any errors printing in the server or client?

Try tracing what packets are being sent/received from both. See what happens.[/quote]
Thanks a lot man!
Yes, there were some errors and I fixed them.
Again, thanks a lot!
This has solved all my problems, you were right! Eclipse is really good!

Read full topic

item.title: (PI) Eclipse error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Tbh, sounds packet related.

Are there any errors printing in the server or client?

Try tracing what packets are being sent/received from both. See what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: (PI) Eclipse error
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:550217”]http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1736730/eclipse-magic-are-only-available-if-source-level-is-1-5-yesterday-everythi
Ignore the main post, read the first answer.[/quote]
Yes, Thank you. It has worked.
I’m experiencing only one problem though, when I run the server, then I go ahead and run the Client, everything loads up, I log in and it logs in fine, the minute, I click on the map to walk somewhere, I DC and then can’t log back in, “please wait… 60 seconds” and " try a different world"

Any thoughts?

Read full topic

item.title: (PI) Eclipse error
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Hello there, I am not sure If I am supposed to post this here, but, I just tried setting up my server on Eclipse and i’m getting an error.
So, I went ahead and followed this tutorial step by step here; https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527293.0
Then, now I am getting an error;
My error;

[CODE]
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problem:
Syntax error, annotations are only available if source level is 1.5 or greater

at server.util.ControlPanel.<init>(ControlPanel.java:40)
at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:68)

[/CODE]
That’s what i’m facing at the moment.
I think, I might’ve declared the “main class” wrong during the setup, but, I thought it was "server - server"
Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks!
